price: When they traveled further, he said to his servant, “Bring us our morning meal; this journey has truly exhausted us.”
arabic: فَلَمَّا جَاوَزَا قَالَ لِفَتَىٰهُ ءَاتِنَا غَدَآءَنَا لَقَدۡ لَقِينَا مِن سَفَرِنَا هَٰذَا نَصَبٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
